attributes.action: A DECENT PAY RISE FOR THE NHS STAFF
attributes.additional_details:
This would be a special and well earned thank you for the nurses.  They put their lives on the line to help the whole country fight the COVID pandemic. 

And to offer 1% is an absolute insult.
attributes.background:
A decent increase for the nurses as a reward for their hard work during the COVID PANDEMIC 
1% is disgusting!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
